title: If you play Naut support,
body: you deserve to die a slow and painful death.

replies.body: seems like OP either got thrashed by a naut support, or had a naut support and was too much of a noob to wait til 6 and farm patiently :)
Depending on skill order, Nautilus has 3 forms of CC at level 2/3. Why would you 'wait patiently' when Nautilus reaches potentially lane-winning power spikes after only 1/2 levels?
Because only his pull has CC that actually stops people doing things, meaning going in early means the enemy bot lane focuses and kills your ADC

If you want people to die over a game

no comment
Blitzcrank is worse when he actually starts dealing damage.
Started playing Nautilus support even before his E got buffed, he's made of CC, why would you Naut?
Here is how you counter nautilus support. Morgana.
What's wrong with the naughty supporty?
Same goes with Malphite support players tbh
